segment.source: How to Use the Desktop Notification Area for Application Virtualization Client Management
segment.target: How to Use the Desktop Notification Area for Application Virtualization Client Management

segment.source: How to Use the Desktop Notification Area for Application Virtualization Client Management
segment.target: How to Use the Desktop Notification Area for Application Virtualization Client Management

segment.source: How to Use the Desktop Notification Area for Application Virtualization Client Management
segment.target: How to Use the Desktop Notification Area for Application Virtualization Client Management

segment.source: The notification area is a standard Windows feature that, by default, appears in the lower-right corner of the desktop.
segment.target: The notification area is a standard Windows feature that, by default, appears in the lower-right corner of the desktop.

segment.source: You can exercise some Application Virtualization Client functionality from the notification area without starting the Application Virtualization Client Management Console.
segment.target: You can exercise some Application Virtualization Client functionality from the notification area without starting the Application Virtualization Client Management Console.

segment.source: How to Refresh Virtual Applications from the Desktop Notification Area
segment.target: How to Refresh Virtual Applications from the Desktop Notification Area

segment.source: Provides a simple procedure you can use to refresh the list of virtualized applications authorized for the client.
segment.target: Provides a simple procedure you can use to refresh the list of virtualized applications authorized for the client.

segment.source: How to Load Virtual Applications from the Desktop Notification Area
segment.target: How to Load Virtual Applications from the Desktop Notification Area

segment.source: Provides procedures for loading virtualized applications into the cache.
segment.target: Provides procedures for loading virtualized applications into the cache.

segment.source: How to Cancel Loading of Virtual Applications from the Desktop Notification Area
segment.target: How to Cancel Loading of Virtual Applications from the Desktop Notification Area

segment.source: Provides procedures for cancelling the loading of virtual applications.
segment.target: Provides procedures for cancelling the loading of virtual applications.

segment.source: How to Work Offline or Online with Application Virtualization
segment.target: How to Work Offline or Online with Application Virtualization

segment.source: Provides procedures you can use to toggle between offline and online operation.
segment.target: Provides procedures you can use to toggle between offline and online operation.

segment.source: How to Exit the App-V Client from the Notification Area
segment.target: How to Exit the App-V Client from the Notification Area

segment.source: Provides a simple procedure you can use to exit the application from the desktop notification area.
segment.target: Provides a simple procedure you can use to exit the application from the desktop notification area.
